description:
Save space, weight, and money. This compact device combines three items required by Transport Canada into a single convenient pouch.

  • Includes 15m of 6mm high-quality floating line in a throwbag. Meets the requirement for buoyant heaving line
  • Built-in scooped bucket meets the requirement for a bailer or manual bilge pump. 1L capacity
  • Waterproof whistle built into handle buckle meets requirement for a sound-signalling device
  • Mil spec packcloth, durable mesh for quick drying and heavy duty webbing
  • High visibility reflective strip adds night-time safety
name: North Water 4-Bailer
